name: PinChicks
description:
PinChick is a traditional pinball game without those flippy things that you see at the bottom.

Instead you click on the bumpers on the screen to activate them.

The pinball ... I mean "PinChicks" have their own health and you need to burst them by reducing their health to zero for bonus points. You do this by making them bounce all over the place.

  • Graphics created in Photoshop
  • Animations created using Spriter2D
  • Audio created using BFXR and FL Studio
  • Built with Unity
